_base.$description: The font size (in px) to use as the basis for the scale. Is used as font-size.4.

_ratio.$description: The ratio used to calculate each step in the scale. Must be larger than 1 (a ratio of 1 would make all font sizes the same, while a number between 0 and 1 effectively inverts the scale). Larger numbers result in a larger font-size.10 and a smaller font-size.1.
